about_the_game:
STORY:

President Holanka Trump from  Neverland is angry and his mission is to collect Flags in 6 different countries. Tariffs means country flags which is hidden somewhere in different maps. There are now 6 locations: Canada, Mexico, Ukraine, China, Eu and Finland. So in each country Trump mission is to find country flag and after he found flag he has collected current country Tariffs. Trump need avoid different traps like moving saws, chainsaws and bombs. Those kill player and he will respawned to start point map. So can you find all flag tariffs in each country

FEATURES:

- 6 different levels/countries

  • Traps: Moving saws, moving chainsaws, Bombs

  • Steam achievements

DISCLAIMER

This game is a work of fiction. Names, characters, places and events are the products of the authors’ imagination. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, or actual events is purely coincidental.

name: Trump Tariff

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 11
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia 1000 series
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct x9
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 11
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nvidia 2000 series
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct x9

short_description: President Trump need avoid traps and find country flag every different countries
